message:
‎"TSA is not testing and has no plans to use any technology capable of testing DNA."Nobody claimed they currently were. Where did you get that idea from?

http://blog.tsa.gov/2011/02/tsa-testing-dna-no-way.html

Even better than TheDaily's article on "genetic patdowns" is the TSA's denial of "genetic patdowns" while at the same time admitting "genetic patdowns." This is cognitive dissonance at its finest! And even better than the TSA denial are the reader comments beneath the denial. PLEASE READ THE ENTIRE THING FOR MAXIMUM ENTERTAINMENT VALUE.

Here's the link to TheDaily article which inspired TSA's kneejerk denial ... er ... damage control ... er ... cognitive dissonance ... er ... ubdubgrakbluh:

http://www.thedaily.com/page/2011/02/26/news-tsa-scanner-1-2
